title: My game keeps freezing.
body: So when I was playing aram, my screen froze for a really long time so I restarted my computer. This has happened multiple times and I have no idea what's wrong with my computer. The specs already match up with the recommended ones. Please help. And I don't wanna have leaverbuster D:

replies.body:
Hey there,

* Are you playing fullscreen or windowed?
* Are you experiencing similar issues in any other games?
I'm playing windowed. I don't experience similar things in other games.
